prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Drums, Guitar, and Piano are the instruments used in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but Bass is not included.

Style 3:
This composition features Organ, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but Bass is not present.
